channel.title: Starting point?
channel.description:
i have a starting point... and i cant find the coords anywhere... its not ::home or anything... help please?
- Gh0st Jr

item.title: Starting point?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“Gh0st Jr, post:3, topic:218852”]didnt work :mad: btw im using dizzlescape. and the code for the starting stuff i think is… for (int i = 0; i< playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank items bankItems[i] = 0; } for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank item amounts bankItemsN[i] = 0; } for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) { playerEquipment[i] = -1; playerEquipmentN[i] = 0; } Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar(); int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH); int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH); int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR); int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day); playerLastLogin = calc; playerLastConnect = ""; playerIsMember = 1; playerMessages = 0; playerLook[0] = 0; playerLook[1] = 0; playerLook[2] = 3; playerLook[3] = 2; playerLook[4] = 3; playerLook[5] = 2; playerEquipment[playerHat]= ServerCP.Hat; playerEquipment[playerCape]= ServerCP.Cape; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= ServerCP.Amulet; playerEquipment[playerChest]= ServerCP.Chest; playerEquipment[playerShield]= ServerCP.Shield; playerEquipment[playerLegs]= ServerCP.legs; playerEquipment[playerHands]= ServerCP.Gloves; playerEquipment[playerFeet]= ServerCP.Boots; playerEquipment[playerRing]= ServerCP.Ring; playerEquipment[playerArrows]= ServerCP.Arrows; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]= ServerCP.Weapon; pHead = ServerCP.Head; pTorso = ServerCP.Torso; pArms = ServerCP.Arms; pHands = ServerCP.Hands; pLegs = ServerCP.Legs; pFeet = ServerCP.Feet; pBeard = ServerCP.Beard; heightLevel = ServerCP.StartHeight; tele(ServerCP.PlayerX, ServerCP.PlayerY); //start absX = absY = -1; mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1; currentX = 2500;//2500 currentY = 2600;//2600 resetWalkingQueue(); }
anyone know what i need to change?[/quote]

Do that, that will works:)

Read full topic

item.title: Starting point?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Maybe try going into player.java and searching for

		// initial x and y coordinates of the player

you’ll probably find it, mine looks like this

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 2929;//2929; teleportToY = 3560;//3560;
I hope I helped

Read full topic

item.title: Starting point?
item.dc:creator: @jamesbrooks jamesbrooks
item.description:
@jamesbrooks wrote:

mine looks summin like this

[code]
// initial x and y coordinates of the player
heightLevel = 0;
// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
teleportToX = 2871; // 2871;
teleportToY = 2952; // 2952;

    // client initially doesn't know those values yet
    absX = absY = -1;
    mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1;
    currentX = currentY = 0;
    resetWalkingQueue();
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Starting point?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Go into ServerCP.java and change PlayerX and PlayerY.

item.title: Starting point?
item.dc:creator: @Gh0st_Jr Gh0st Jr
item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

didnt work :mad: btw im using dizzlescape. and the code for the starting stuff i think is… for (int i = 0; i< playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank items bankItems[i] = 0; } for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank item amounts bankItemsN[i] = 0; } for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) { playerEquipment[i] = -1; playerEquipmentN[i] = 0; } Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar(); int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH); int month = cal.get(Calendar.MONTH); int year = cal.get(Calendar.YEAR); int calc = ((year * 10000) + (month * 100) + day); playerLastLogin = calc; playerLastConnect = ""; playerIsMember = 1; playerMessages = 0; playerLook[0] = 0; playerLook[1] = 0; playerLook[2] = 3; playerLook[3] = 2; playerLook[4] = 3; playerLook[5] = 2; playerEquipment[playerHat]= ServerCP.Hat; playerEquipment[playerCape]= ServerCP.Cape; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= ServerCP.Amulet; playerEquipment[playerChest]= ServerCP.Chest; playerEquipment[playerShield]= ServerCP.Shield; playerEquipment[playerLegs]= ServerCP.legs; playerEquipment[playerHands]= ServerCP.Gloves; playerEquipment[playerFeet]= ServerCP.Boots; playerEquipment[playerRing]= ServerCP.Ring; playerEquipment[playerArrows]= ServerCP.Arrows; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]= ServerCP.Weapon; pHead = ServerCP.Head; pTorso = ServerCP.Torso; pArms = ServerCP.Arms; pHands = ServerCP.Hands; pLegs = ServerCP.Legs; pFeet = ServerCP.Feet; pBeard = ServerCP.Beard; heightLevel = ServerCP.StartHeight; tele(ServerCP.PlayerX, ServerCP.PlayerY); //start absX = absY = -1; mapRegionX = mapRegionY = -1; currentX = currentY = 0; resetWalkingQueue(); }
anyone know what i need to change?
